body:
▼I think people getting triggered is some kind of meme by itself, there might be a possibility that he/she intentionally wrote that because this is the right doujin to do it.

btw this doujin precisely describe nina's what if bad end route of the original nina commu in the game. That's just too sad. 10/10 drama

"But think of the fictional children! The 2D children must be rescued by the UNICEF!"
▼Found the triggered hypocrite SJW, who the fuck cares if it's a drawing? No one in that drawing was harmed in real life.
If you are reading and fapped to this, you are A SICK MOTHERF*CKER who deserves a miscarried child im the future. Jesus fuck, I stopped at the first sex scene.. I can't...
